Title: Governs election of board by residents of cooperatives and condominiums
Summary: Requires that the board of directors or board of managers of a converted cooperative or condominium, as the case may be, must be comprised of a majority of members elected by shareholders or owners in occupancy so that control of the converted cooperative or condominium is turned over to the unit owners as soon as possible; applies only to plans of 20 or more units.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to plans for conversions of residences to cooperative or condominium ownership
